alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Dawson; Sherman (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 16 at 11:32PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Buffalo, southwestern Sherman and northeastern Dawson Counties through MIDNIGHT CDT... At 1132 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles southwest of Mason City to 6 miles south of Sumner. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Litchfield, Amherst, Riverdale and Hazard. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for south central and central Nebraska.
